Hello
Hope you are doing well today!!!

Position: Python Developer
Location: DEARBORN, MI (Onsite)
Duration: Long term Contract

Job Description:
Role name: Developer

Role Description:
1. Should have at least 3+ years as Python backend development
2. Any Framework Experience (2+ Yrs): Django, Flask, Fast API
3. Should have at least 1+ years of working experience on Rest API
4. Should have at least 2+ years of Application Development Experience
5. Should have experience on Pytest and Jenkins
6. Working experience on GCP will add an advantage.

Competencies:
Digital : Python, Digital : Python Web Frameworks

Experience (Years): 10+

Essential Skills:
1. Should have at least 3+ years as Python backend development
2. Any Framework Experience (2+ Yrs): Django, Flask, Fast API
3. Should have at least 1+ years of working experience on Rest API
4. Should have at least 2+ years of Application Development Experience
5. Should have experience on Pytest and Jenkins
6. Working experience on GCP will add an advantage.

Desirable Skills:
1. Should have at least 3+ years as Python backend development

4. Should have at least 2+ years of Application Development Experience
